ygData.subject: RE: Please Help! I need dueling tips!
ygData.msgSnippet: Also remember to hotkey your spells! Qanin Skywanderer The Rathe 25th circle ... From: I. G [mailto:shadowtg1@hotmail.com] Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 1:17
ygData.messageBody:
Also remember to hotkey your spells!

Qanin Skywanderer
The Rathe 25th circle


-----Original Message-----
From: I. G [mailto:shadowtg1@...]
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 1:17 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Please Help! I need dueling tips!


From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>

blind, fear, holy might, smite, and root. all are good also remember to
have pro magic, poison and disease up. I know thier DoTs use it.. ya might
want to try and get the SSoL before the fight as well as that will help
remove any DoTs that the shaman might put on ya.

Get Stun, and Holy might in mem (if ya have the time that is) and only use
them when they start to cast... stun is a fast casting spell. holy might is

a little longer. blind works well. If it is used right before the fear
they will run away and not know where.. that could be good for ya.

Root might not be all that good for ya as he does not need to hit you to
kill you... also have dispell magic ready, just remember it will start at
the top.

Jaxim

ps please correct any info I might have wrong.


>From: Kevin Dailey <kevin_dailey@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Please Help! I need dueling tips!
>Date: Fri, 13 Aug 1999 11:36:15 -0500
>
>From: Kevin Dailey <kevin_dailey@...>
>
>Hi all,
>
>I'm in a guild that encourages weekly fights in pvp areas in order to
>increase prestige and guild rank. I'm currently a level 15 cleric, and
>have been challenged by a level 14 troll shaman (yipes). Any hints,
>tips, or fighting strategies would be most helpful. I am skilled in both
>one handed and two handed blunt, and have a runed totem staff, a fine
>steel morning star, and a Qeynos shield (ac 10). My dark elf cleric also
>has 90 str, 73 sta, 99 agi, 88 dex, and 98 wis. If I can get to level 19
>before sunday night (gonna have to camp Jonah Brucker all weekend with
>my necro friend!), I can buy Extinguish fatigue, endure magic, daring,
>holy might (not sure what the stats are on it, but it sounds promising),
>extinguish fatigue, and spirit armor.
>
>This is my second character, and I made sure (this time!) to get skill
>in Divinate...so I can possibly blind the shaman at the start. I could
>try fearing him, too, but don't know if that will work in the small pvp
>area in neriak. Hmm. I also have cancel magic, but you know how those
>shamans can cast and cast and cast....and i'd hate to waste my mana. If
>i buff with all the endure spells before hand, will I be all right
>against his debuffing spells? I will also be wearing Crush's tunic,
>which gives +8 resistance to heat, poison, magic, and cold. And I will
>have some bronze, too, so my ac shouldn't be too low. However, i know
>that the shaman will be in full banded. And he will be wielding a
>bloodforge hammer, which he says hits for 25-26 consistently. With my
>runed totem staff, i hit for 19. With the morning star, i hit for 16.
>However, with his buffs, he will be extremely difficult to hit! And my
>stamina will not last long at all, especially after he hits me with his
>level 14 spell that sucks str, sta, and ac. Sighhhh....What's a poor
>cleric to do?
>
>Please help!
>
>Saidinn Ba'alRafar
>Karana Server
>
>
>
